data.name: Berkshire Easy Lite
data.description: Everybody likes easy, so we made this NEIPA easy to like with Citra, Amarillo and Simcoe hops, a medium body and fermented it with a German style ale yeast. This double dry-hopped brew has a hazy straw color and a clean finish to make Easy Like a session-able NEIPA, easy for you to enjoy any time. #EasyLikeNEIPA
data.food_pairing: Grilled chicken, Salad, Light pasta dishes

data.name: Shovel Town Pillow Factory NEIPA
data.description: Pillow Factory is a fluffy, juicy, and rich New England IPA. Dry Hopped with Mosaic and Hallertau Blanc hops.
data.food_pairing: Spicy Thai curry, Grilled chicken, Citrus salad

data.name: Foundation Burnside Brown Ale
data.description: Burnside is our brown ale. Layered with roasted notes of coffee, burnt sugar, and chocolate, but balanced by a touch of malty sweetness and rolled oats for body, it finishes smooth and easy.
data.food_pairing: BBQ ribs, Gouda cheese, Chocolate dessert

data.name: Great Divide Car Camper Hazy Pale Ale
data.description:
CAR CAMPER is the beer to fuel your next adventure. Generously hopped and dry-hopped with Sabro hops, the aroma hints at cantaloupe, mango
and coconut and finishes evenly with a pleasant mouthfeel. Surrender to
your wanderlust and be sure to pack plenty of CAR CAMPER. 5.0% ABV
data.food_pairing: Spicy chicken wings, Grilled shrimp tacos, Citrus salad

data.name: Barrelhouse Brewing Standard Ale
data.description: Meet BarrelHouse Standard Ale. Crushable, low on alcohol, and crafted to reduce gluten. Raise your Standard!
data.food_pairing: Burgers, BBQ ribs, Spicy wings

data.name: Bayou Teche Big Fatty
data.description: HAZY, JUICY, DANK, DON'T BOGART THIS IPA MY FRIEND
data.food_pairing: Spicy Cajun dishes, Grilled sausages, Gumbo

data.name: Wiley Roots Ski Greeley Hazy IPA
data.description: Hazy India Pale Ale with Strata, Vic Secret, and BRU-1 experimental hops.
data.food_pairing: Spicy Thai curry, Grilled chicken tacos, Mango habanero wings

data.name: Wiley Roots Swatches Tropical Tides NEIPA
data.description: East Coast Style India Pale Ale with Citra and El Dorado hops.
data.food_pairing: Spicy Thai curry, Grilled shrimp, Mango salsa

data.name: Machine House Golden Ale
data.description: One of our three year-round standard offerings. A refreshing Golden Ale, with a bright, crisp malt body and complex English hop character.
data.food_pairing: Fish, Chicken, Salad

data.name: Beer'd Dogs vs. Shinobi IPA
data.description: We joined forces with our Chicago brethren from Pipeworks Brewing Company for this mashup of two of our favorite brands. Dogs Vs. Shinobi takes each breweries lead brand and mashes them together into a hazy, fruit forward, lower ABV offering. Citra, Simcoe and Mosaic hops and Guava Puree lend notes of fresh orange peel and other tropical characters. This will certainly be a battle for the ages!
data.food_pairing: Spicy sausage, BBQ ribs, Buffalo wings

data.name: Hidden Cove Brewing Booty
data.description: A rich Belgian golden ale flavored with raspberries.
data.food_pairing: Spicy chicken wings, BBQ ribs, Chocolate desserts

data.name: Key Brewing Expeditiously IPA
data.description: Enjoy this New England STyle IPA triple dry hopped with Simcoe, Citra, and Nelson Sauvin
data.food_pairing: Spicy Thai curry, Grilled chicken, Sharp cheddar cheese

data.name: Loveland Aleworks Cold IPA
data.description: We brewed this beer with Pilsner malt and flaked maize adjunct, fermented warm with lager yeast, then dry-hopped with El Dorado, Amarillo, and Citra hops for a crisp and refreshing, sessionable IPA that boasts a balanced bitterness and subtle strength.
data.food_pairing: Spicy Thai curry, Grilled chicken tacos, Sharp cheddar cheese

data.name: Loveland Aleworks Haze Bros of the Galaxy
data.description: We exclusively dry-hop this hazy IPA three times with Citra, Galaxy, and Mosaic hops resulting in low bitterness and a juicy hop character.
data.food_pairing: Spicy Thai curry, Grilled chicken tacos, Mango habanero wings

data.name: James Ready Original Ale
data.description: Original Ale is the Ready family’s most original member. Ale was cool before cool was cool. It’s a brew crafted with roasted malts, American hops, and fermented in our signature yeast. Swing by your local beer store to pick up a case but please, no pictures.
data.food_pairing: Burgers, BBQ ribs, Spicy chicken wings

data.name: Pikes Peak Brewing Ocean of Clouds NE IPA
data.description: A Hazy, Juicy New England IPA made with Kveik yeast. Double dry hopped with Azzaca, Cascade and Amarillo hops.
data.food_pairing: Spicy Thai curry, Grilled shrimp, Mango salsa

data.name: Pontoon New Wave Blonde Ale
data.description: It’s just a blonde ale, right? FALSE. Our New Wave Blonde ale was brewed with an English yeast to provide some fruity esters that give this simplistic style a well-rounded character, while remaining crisp and light. Light notes of semi-sweet fruits and bready malts dance on your tongue while finishing clean, crisp and refreshing! Ride the New Wave and drink a beer that tastes like a beer should!
data.food_pairing: Seafood, Grilled chicken, Salad

data.name: Ship Bottom Mermaid Blonde Ale
data.description: Mermaid Blonde Ale 5% ABV Our Blonde Ale is an easy-drinking Summer Ale that is visually appealing and has minimal Hop Bitterness. You’ll experience a slight sweetness from the malt and a Citrus/Lemon flavor on the back end⁣.
data.food_pairing: Seafood, Grilled chicken, Salad

data.name: Sixpoint Hootie Hazy IPA
data.description: Let your instincts take over. Channel your inner beast. When our brewmaster pulls a fresh beer IBU off the canning line he brings everyone close to crack it open and inhale the instantaneous aroma explosion. It’s ritualistic. This sort of obsession led to vision quests in Pacific Northwest hop fields, not to mention years of maniacal recipe modification on a small scale. Embrace your inner HOOTIE and fly silently into the night!
data.food_pairing: Spicy Thai curry, Grilled chicken, Citrus salad

data.name: Sixpoint Spritzer Bomb Hazy IIPA
data.description: When brewers can get together, draw on their existing expertise and make something unique and absolutely delicious. Sloop and Sixpoint have come together over the years to make four versions of these collaborative IPAs, drawing from the source material of Sloop’s iconic Juice Bomb, combined with Sixpoint’s foray into grain-grape combinations in the small batch Spritzer series. Spritzer Bomb is all the juice of a serious hazy IPA with the tingly finish of sauvignon blanc grapes. Bombs away!
data.food_pairing: Spicy Thai curry, Grilled shrimp, Blue cheese

data.name: The Tank Lo-Ca Tropical Blonde Ale
data.description: Miami’s original low-calorie craft beer. The name Lo-Ca not only reflects the low-calorie goodness of this craft beer but is also a nod to our Miami roots. This golden blonde ale is bursting with notes of pineapple, lime, lemon zest and floral hops. With only 94 calories and 2.8 grams of carbs, Lo-Ca aims to satisfy craft beer fans who seek a more balanced & flavorful alternative to your typical light beer. Perfect for the active go-getter who doesn’t want to compromise when it comes to taste and authenticity.
data.food_pairing: Spicy Thai curry, Grilled shrimp, Mango salsa

data.name: Skydance Fancy Dance NEIPA
data.description: Fancy Dance is a juicy, hazy, fruity New England Style IPA and is brewed as a tribute to the most popular style of Native American dance seen at modern day pow wows. This heavily dry hopped hazy IPA showcases Citra, Mosaic and Simcoe hops bringing a huge punch of citrus and tropical fruit flavors to your pallet.
data.food_pairing: Spicy Thai curry, Grilled shrimp, Mango salsa

data.name: Tommyknocker Drift Blonde Ale
data.description: Easy drinking, light, and refreshing.
data.food_pairing: Spicy Thai food, Grilled chicken, Citrus salad

data.name: Wormtown Blizzard of 78
data.description: The storm by which all storms are measured. Our winter offering pays tribute to those who were there and those who have endured hearing about it over and over again. We created a classic English-style Brown Ale with fresh roasted coffee beans added from Acoustic Java to give Blizzard of 78 a rich, smooth character that will make you enjoy hearing more stories of walking through 27 inches of snow, uphill, blah, blah, blah.
data.food_pairing: Seafood, BBQ ribs, Chocolate desserts

data.name: AleSmith Cloud Stream IPA
data.description: You’ve just stumbled upon a beer so rich in hazy content that it had to be downloaded from the Cloud. Like a river of juiciness flowing from the heavens, this year-round hazy IPA is packed with dazzling notes of red currant, passionfruit, and mango. It’s full body and creamy mouthfeel are followed by a smooth, drinkable finish. Cheers!
data.food_pairing: Spicy Thai curry, Grilled chicken, Sharp cheddar cheese

data.name: Blue Owl Pastry Gose
data.description: Sour Blueberry Cobbler
data.food_pairing: Pastries, Cheese, Fruit

data.name: Boulevard Brewing Easy Sport Recreation Ale
data.description: A bright, refreshing, super drinkable ale with a hint of citrus, Easy Sport is a perfect fit for an active lifestyle. Beginning with a clean, easy-drinking blonde ale recipe, we add electrolytes to an extended mash and boil to create a deliciously dry, beautifully balanced beer. At the end of fermentation, we add more electrolytes and a touch of tangerine peel, resulting in a slightly tart, subtly salty, all-natural, low calorie, carb-conscious beer.
data.food_pairing: Grilled chicken, Citrus salad, Pretzels

data.name: Catawba Brewing Endless Trail Pilsner
data.description: The crisp, clean, and crushable Endless Trail Pilsner is here! We started with an easy-drinking pilsner recipe and added a touch of intrigue with a mild noble hop addition late in fermentation. The result is an approachable, yet complex and flavorful go-to brew suitable for any occasion. Pack it in and pack it out if you enjoy hiking Life’s Endless Trail.
data.food_pairing: Spicy Thai food, Grilled chicken, Soft pretzels

data.name: Mill Creek Love in Action Imperial IPA
data.description: We love hops, this new release is a visceral representation of everything we love about hops and hazy IPAs crammed into a can. Exclusively whirlpool and dry hop additions bring out the big and bold flavors and amazing aromas. The complex hop profile definitely leans heavily towards the tropical and stone fruit but you can expect to find hints of blueberry, tangerine, passionfruit and pine lingering under the surface. We chose hops from around the globe to showcase their unique flavors, Rakau from New Zealand, Southern Star from South Africa, and Trident, a proprietary blend of Pacific NorthWest hops. Each variety is known for a tropical fruit forward profile yet each adds interesting and subtle characteristics creating a complex and delicious beer.
data.food_pairing: Spicy Thai curry, Grilled steak, Sharp cheddar cheese

data.name: Palisade Laid Back Blonde
data.description: Summer days in the grand valley influenced this crisp, refreshing day drinker. LBB is our lightest brew but isn’t lacking in flavor. Look for soft nutty and fruit flavors with a light and hoppy finish.
data.food_pairing: Salad, Grilled Chicken, Lemon Bars

data.name: Rodenbach Alexander
data.description: RODENBACH Alexander is a blend of 2/3rd aged RODENBACH (2 year matured beer from oak standing Foeders) and 1/3rd young ale, then macerated with sour cherries.  With an ABV of 5.6%, RODENBACH Alexander is offered in draught one-way kegs and 750ML bottles, adorned with the image of Alexander Rodenbach, one of the brewery's founding brothers.
data.food_pairing: Duck, Cherry pie, Dark chocolate

data.name: River Horse Summer Blonde
data.description: Great summer memories are born out of uncomplicated times. Weve made that the basis for our Summer blonde recipe and kept this ale pure and simple. Relax and enjoy this all natural  light  golden beauty. A seasonal offering from the River Horse Brewing Company.
data.food_pairing: Grilled chicken, Citrus salad, Key lime pie

data.name: Checkerspot Maximum Fruitage Blueberry IPA
data.description: This NEIPA/Hazy IPA is brewed with more than 300 lbs of local sweet and sour cherries from Baugher's Orchard and Southern Passion, Nelson Sauvin and Barbe Rouge hops.
data.food_pairing: Spicy chicken wings, Grilled salmon, Mixed berry salad

data.name: Deep Ellum Brewing Co. Easy Peasy IPA
data.description: If there was ever an IPA made for summer, Easy Peasy is it! Brewed with tangerine and lemon peel, and Pacific Northwest aroma hops, this is one easy-drinking IPA that will leave you thirsting for more year-round.
data.food_pairing: Spicy Thai food, Grilled chicken, Citrus salad

data.name: Flying Fish Abbey Dubbel
data.description: Winner of the silver medal at the 2008 Great American Beer Festival, this Belgian-style Abbey Dubbel is an exceptionally complex beer with many interwoven flavors. This classic-style Abbey beer features an immense head with a fruity nose and a generous body. Malty in the middle, the beer features a clean, almondy dry finish and a slight alcohol warmth. More like a wine than a beer—it has a lot of the qualities of a fine Burgundy.
data.food_pairing: Grilled sausages, Roasted duck, Dark chocolate

data.name: Genesee Brewing Company Cream Ale
data.description: Smooth like a lager. Crisp like an ale. Cream Ale was one of the first styles created in America, and ours has set the standard since 1960. Our Cream Ale has won numbers awards throughout the years and remains just as smooth and flavorful today as it has always been. A true American original.
data.food_pairing: Spicy chicken wings, Grilled sausages, Sharp cheddar cheese

data.name: Sanitas Hazy IPA
data.description:
Hazy IPAs are making their mark around the Sanitas
brewhouse. Our flagship Hazy IPA is everything you
want in a fruity, fluffy hop experience - and then
some. It’s pitched with a newer yeast called Cosmic
Punch, a punchy strain that unleashes vibrant
grapefruit, passion fruit and guava aromatics. It’s
triple dry-hopped with Cascade, Citra and Amarillo
hops and each sip comes with a lush mouthfeel and
slightly bitter finish.
data.food_pairing: Spicy Thai curry, Grilled chicken tacos, Sharp cheddar cheese

data.name: Tem Blor Brewing Co Hazy Z New England IPA
data.description: This New England-style IPA uses a low flocculating yeast – meaning the yeast will stay in suspension, giving it a hazy characteristic. Like rap music, once called a fad, we think this style of beer will be around for years to come.
data.food_pairing: Spicy Thai curry, Grilled shrimp, Mango salsa

data.name: The Hobbit Bolg Belg Tripel Ale Fb
data.description: An Orc chieftain who ruled for 150 years, Bolg would drink his grog of choice and no one would tell him otherwise – a flavorful strong Belgian Tripel. Some said it refined an otherwise gruesome character.
data.food_pairing: Spicy Thai curry, Grilled sausages, Creamy brie cheese

data.name: Renegade Wit(h) Passion
data.description: Our Belgian Style White Ale with Passion Fruit features a pleasant, light sweetness from the passion fruit that is balanced with the delicate herbal spice of coriander. Brightly carbonated and refreshingly crisp, with a dry, tart finish.
data.food_pairing: Spicy Thai food, Grilled shrimp, Lemon tart

data.name: Austin Beerworks Megaflora
data.description: You've whacked through a thicket of typical IPAs. Now you come upon Megaflora, hanging on the vine like a ripe melon. With a simple tap, citrus disco balls spill out enveloping you in a cloud of fruity indulgence. You're going to megafauna over it.
data.food_pairing: Spicy BBQ ribs, Grilled chicken, Sharp cheddar cheese

data.name: Avery Island Rascal
data.description: Inspired by our love for the tangy and bold passion fruit of Hawaii, Island Rascal combines the lusciousness of a Belgian-Style Wheat Ale with the juiciness and electric tingle of passion fruit. This golden explosion of fruity goodness is the perfect companion to breakfast, the beach, and of course BBQs!
data.food_pairing: Spicy Thai food, Grilled chicken, Sharp cheddar cheese

data.name: BarrelHouse Sunny Daze Blonde Ale
data.description: We crafted this refreshing CITRUS BLONDE ALE to pair with our sunny California days. Since its debut, people can’t get enough of this smooth nectar. Grab a cold six pack and venture off the beaten path. Cheers!
data.food_pairing: Grilled chicken, Citrus salad, Lemon bars

data.name: Barrelhouse Sunny Daze
data.description: The perfect refreshing ale for those sunny California days. We crafted this delicious tropical blonde with clementine oranges and fresh local orange blossom honey. Since we debuted this smooth sweet nectar people can’t seem to get enough. Grab a bottle or pint of Sunny Daze and venture off the beaten path.
data.food_pairing: Grilled chicken, Citrus salad, Lemon bars

data.name: Bootstrap Brewing Adventure Series Golden Ale
data.description: This delicious, award-winning Golden Ale has won multiple GABF medals in the Golden/Blonde category so of course we had to put it in a can so you can enjoy it out in the wilderness hiking, biking, camping, rafting or exploring on horseback.
data.food_pairing: Spicy Thai curry, Grilled chicken, Citrus salad

data.name: Bootstrap Brewing Pickle Me Up Gold Ale with Pickle Juice
data.description: Our delicious, award winning Golden Ale with just the right amount of pickle juice to create a light, refreshing ale with a hint of pickle flavor. Fantastic as a Michelada base!
data.food_pairing: Burgers, Fried Chicken, Pretzels

data.name: BrickStone Hydro Juice Hazy IPA
data.description: A hazy IPA part of our HaZ’D Up Series. Double dry hopped to perfection with Amarillo, Cryo Citra, Cyro Mosaic, and Huell Melon hops. A delicious combo giving off powerful notes of passion fruit and berries.
data.food_pairing: Spicy Thai curry, Grilled chicken tacos, Citrus glazed salmon

data.name: Burlington Strawberry Whale Cake
data.description: Strawberry Whale Cake is the original in our Series of easy drinking Cream Ales brewed with Fruit. Strawberry Whale Cake starts out as a traditional style Cream Ale brewed with large quantities of Corn in the grist bill creating the classic cream-y body Cream ales are famous for (no lactose in this style). We then double down on the fruit addition, in this case Strawberry to complement the easy drinking nature of the base style. Flavors and aromas of freshly picked strawberries from your local berry patch balances out the refreshing medium to light body on our favorite warm weather seasonal series.
data.food_pairing: Cheesecake, Grilled Chicken, Mixed Berries

data.name: Coronado Brewing Salty Crew Blonde Ale
data.description: This boat beer is crisp, versatile, and refreshing. Is perfectly balanced with a simple malt profile and German hops making a light-bodied, crushable ale.
data.food_pairing: Seafood, Grilled chicken, Salad

data.name: Czig Meister Sundial Stellium IPA
data.description: Brewed with raspberry, lemon, and hibiscus, don't sleep on this sundial! Soured intensely with our house culture and hopped lightly with some of our favorite citra. Punchy raspberry upfront, with sweet and fragrant hibiscus following and a citric lemon tang that lingers!
data.food_pairing: Spicy Thai food, Grilled chicken, Sharp cheddar cheese

data.name: Firefly Hollow Brewing Pacific Bud NEIPA
data.description: Local CT grow 2 row malted wheat and flaked triticale. With a Pacific hop blend
data.food_pairing: Spicy Thai curry, Grilled shrimp, Mango salsa

data.name: Firefly Hollow Glow NEIPA
data.description: It’s brewed the New England way, with very little bitterness and plenty of hop flavor. We use a blend of Azacca, Palisade, and Amarillo hops for a pleasant juicy impression without any bite. Look for flavors of lemon-lime, sharp grapefruit, and a touch of doughy wheat.
data.food_pairing: Spicy Thai curry, Grilled chicken, Citrus salad

data.name: Flying Fish Winter Cru
data.description: Hints of cinnamon and nutmeg are highlighted in the belgian-style ale that’s made for cold weather enjoyment. Available October- March.
data.food_pairing: Roast duck, Gouda cheese, Chocolate dessert

data.name: Golden Road Brewing Guava Dia Blonde Ale
data.description: Guava Dia is a hazy amber color, creamy flavor, with a dry finish. An easy drinking Blonde Ale with bright flavors of guava and pineapple. Guava Dia is a light and refreshing blond ale perfect for relaxing after work on a cool summer night.
data.tasting_notes: Crisp, Dry, Fresh, Fruity, Guava, Light, Pineapple, Smooth, Tropical, Tropical Fruit
data.food_pairing: Spicy Thai curry, Grilled chicken, Tropical fruit salad

data.name: Grimm Brothers Brewhouse Dragon Bloom NEIPA
data.description: NE style IPA with Citra, Zoso and Mosiac hops.
data.food_pairing: Spicy Thai curry, Grilled chicken tacos, Mango habanero wings

data.name: Lake Zurich Magnetic North - Warmouth Cream Ale
data.description: Clean, crisp and highly crushable, Warmouth reaches all day drink-ability. Clean malts and subtle corn flavors fill out this beer’s 4.9% abv. A gentle bitterness produced exclusively by German Perle hops and a crispy carbonation balances the finish for a highly refreshing drink.
data.food_pairing: Grilled chicken, Salad, Fish tacos

data.name: Living The Dream Brewing Powder Run
data.description: A light bodied, creamy ale with light and fluffy notes of vanilla.
data.food_pairing: Spicy chicken wings, BBQ ribs, Chocolate desserts

data.name: Local Craft Beer Maryland Mob Hazy Double IPA
data.description: Collaboration with “Maryland Mob” of the world famous destination beer shares. Galaxy & Citra with some Simcoe to boost! Forget about it!
data.food_pairing: Spicy chicken wings, Grilled shrimp tacos, Sharp cheddar cheese

data.name: Newburyport Plum Island Belgian White
data.description: An unfiltered witbier with hints of citrus & coriander. This "partly cloudy" ale features slight citrus and spicy aromas complemented by mild sweet pilsner and wheat malt tastes. Our friends in Belgium would be proud of us.
data.food_pairing: Seafood, Salad, Fruit

data.name: Omission Ultimate Light Golden Ale
data.description: With only 3 carbs and 99 calories, Ultimate Light Golden Ale is smooth and easy drinking, but full of flavor.  Citrusy hops and clean finish leave you wanting more - and with our low calories and carbs, you can have another without feeling full.  Like all Omission beers, Ultimate Light is crafted to remove gluten.
data.food_pairing: Grilled chicken, Salad, Seafood

data.name: Temblor Hazy Mango IPA
data.description: This NE-Style IPA was dry-hopped with Mosaic and Vic Secret and has a ton of added Mango!
data.food_pairing: Spicy Thai curry, Grilled shrimp, Mango salsa

data.name: TUPPS Brewery  National Standard Blonde
data.description: Crisp and crushable. Hasn’t that always been our collective standard? Built for the lake, the pool, the game, the patio, the party, the... you get the idea. It’s what we do best!
data.food_pairing: Grilled chicken, Salad, Seafood

data.name: Unibroue Don De Dieu
data.description: Poured from bottle to snifter. One finger crisp head, fades rather quickly into thin film. A ring of head around glass edge, but little lacing. Darker straw color, and quite cloudy. Bananas and cloves on nose, with some tropical fruit and brown sugar characteristics. Hints of strawberry and clementine. Tastes very fruity, mostly bright red fruits and green grapes. Has a slightly bitter aftertaste, works well in the balance. Some spiciness. Higher carbonation and thicker, slightly syrupy body, though leaves a sparkling sensation that lingers. Does not seem like it is 9%. Delicious, complex and balanced. Though on expensive side (~$4/12 oz bottle), will certainly be buying more for special occasions.
data.food_pairing: Cheese, Charcuterie, Spicy dishes

data.name: Union Juicing Room
data.description: We couldn’t celebrate our 8th Anniversary without creating a delicious Sour Ale– so we’re rolling you straight into the Juicing Room. Crack a can open for an intense aroma of lemon and blueberry backed by a fresh baked muffin-like malt character. Juicing Room is dry and highly refreshing on the palate with a snap of berry skin tannin and citrus pith balancing the sweeter notes. The color is a rich hazy burgundy- capped by a pink foam.
data.food_pairing: Spicy Thai curry, Grilled chicken, Dark chocolate

data.name: Urban South Who Dat Golden Ale
data.description: Who Dat Golden Ale is brewed with Pilsner and Flaked Barley and fermented with a hybrid yeast allowing this beer to ferment as an ale and then condition as a lager to create a crisp and refreshing beer. We added Citra and Hallertau Blanc in the kettle to give a punch of fragrant lemongrass, green grape and grapefruit!
data.food_pairing: Spicy Cajun cuisine, Grilled shrimp, Gumbo

data.name: Yards Philly Standard
data.description: Sometimes you just want a beer. No bells. No whistles. Just a good, handcrafted, no-nonsense beer that works just as hard as you do. Light. Clean. Easy. The standard beer for every occasion.
data.food_pairing: Cheese, BBQ ribs, Pretzels

data.name: Around The Bend Vixen Cream Ale
data.description: Prepare For The Boom is a North East Triple India Pale Ale brewed with Domestic Row 2, Blond Roasted Oats and Flaked Wheat. Featuring ZERO Lactose, this one is hopped with Mosaic, Motueka and Wakatu then dry hopped with an obnoxious amount of Lupulin Mosaic, Moteuka and Wakatu. You definitely won't wanna protect ya neck from this brew. Huge aromatics of Candied Lime pop off the nose and lead into a hazy cacophony of Tropical Starburst, Lime and Stone Fruit notes through it's Oated Backbone.
data.food_pairing: Spicy chicken wings, Grilled shrimp, Gouda cheese

data.name: Bronx Brewery Smile My Guy IPA
data.description:
Light Body. Citrus Hops. Happy Vibes.
A craveable, crushable, any-time-of-the-day IPA brewed to put a smile on your face, featuring Perico Limited’s iconic ‘Smile My Guy’ design on the label.

Grain: 2-Row, White Wheat, Carafoam
Hops: Ariana, Cascade, Centennial, Comet, Mandarina Bavaria
What Else: Lemon Peel
data.food_pairing: Spicy chicken wings, grilled shrimp, sharp cheddar cheese

data.name: Duchesse De Bourgogne
data.description: Belgian top-fermented reddish-brown ale, a blend of 8 and 18 months old beers following the careful maturation in oak casks.
data.food_pairing: Cheese, Duck, Chocolate

data.name: Goose Island Halia Farmhouse Ale
data.description: Halia is a farmhouse ale aged in wine barrels with whole peaches, resulting in bright, effervescent fruit notes in a soft, hazy body that finishes slightly tart and sweet with the pleasant character of ripe, juicy peaches. Literally meaning “remembrance of a loved one” in Hawaiian, Halia beer was brewed in memory of the dear friend of one of our brewers who loved peaches.
data.food_pairing: Cheese, Grilled Chicken, Salad

data.name: Left Hand Nitro Flamingo Dreams
data.description: You stand out in a crowd and only need one leg to find balance. You’re not afraid to get your feet wet and you don’t give a flock what others think. You embrace your inner flamingo and dare to turn your dreams into reality. You’re ready for pink beer. Flamingo Dreams is a refreshing change from the ordinary with a berry burst, frisky zing and a Nitro glide that’ll bring out your vibrant side. Join the flock and let’s flamingle.
data.tasting_notes: Berry, Bright, Citrus, Currant, Flavored, Fruity, Red Fruit, Smooth, Tart, Velvety
data.food_pairing: Spicy Thai curry, Grilled shrimp, Key lime pie

data.name: Paperback One Night W/ Nora Blonde Ale
data.description: An approachable, easy-drinking beer that is visually appealing and has no particularly dominating malt or hop characteristics.  Smooth and balanced with a tonuch of honey malt.
data.food_pairing: Grilled chicken, Salad, Lemon bars

data.name: Refuge Brewery Blonde Ale
data.description: New to the line up is this super easy drinking Blonde Ale.  Incredibly smooth and refreshing, this is the go-to beer for our  own Brew Crew after a long day in the brewery!  Blonde Ale is widely avalible on draft, and be on the look out for cans hitting shelves around you soon!
data.food_pairing: Grilled chicken, Salad, Fish tacos

data.name: Abomination Wandering Into The Fog Galaxy DIPA
data.description: Brewed with a heavy wheat and oat malt bill, hopped and double dry hopped aggressively with 7+lbs per bbl of Mosaic, Pacific Jade, Citra, Summit and a ton of Galaxy! Fluffy, pillowy, juicy, dank, DDH goodness.
data.food_pairing: Spicy Thai curry, Grilled shrimp, Blue cheese

data.name: AleSmith Nut Brown Ale
data.description: AleSmith Nut Brown is a tribute to one of our favorite British styles. Deep mahogany in color, its rich, malt-forward flavor profile balances notes of biscuit, mild cocoa and earthy hops. A creamy mouthfeel and full body enhances its drinkability, making Nut Brown an extremely sessionable ale that embodies our commitment to quality.
data.food_pairing: Grilled steak, Gouda cheese, Chocolate desserts

data.name: Boulevard Brewing Company Vintage Stock Saison Ale
data.description: Vintage Stock is a blend of two dark, moderately sour, mixed-culture saisons aged for many months in oak foeders, puncheons and red wine barrels. Re-fermented on 30,000 pounds of both whole Norton grapes and pressed Norton grape juice, this love letter to wild fermentation blurs the line between beer and wine, and is our most ambitious fruited mixed-culture beer to date.
data.food_pairing: Grilled chicken, Goat cheese, Mixed greens salad

data.name: Braven Crowded Places IPA
data.description: This New England IPA is brewed with Citra and Galaxy hops giving it a juicy and floral taste, El dorado hops were added for bittering. A smooth mouthfeel is a result of flaked oats and wheat added to the mash. Crowded places is refreshing and drinkable all year long.
data.food_pairing: Spicy Thai curry, Grilled chicken, Sharp cheddar cheese

data.name: Buffalo Bill's Brewery America's Original Pumpkin Ale
data.description: Since its inception in 1985, America’s Original Pumpkin Ale has become a Fall tradition. Much of Buffalo Bill’s acclaim originates from this beloved autumn brew. Made with real pumpkin and spices, it has a golden amber color, and the sweet aroma of warm pumpkin pie, 6% ABV.
data.food_pairing: Turkey, Roasted Vegetables, Pumpkin Pie

data.name: DuClaw Strawberry Letter 23
data.description: Named after the popular hit, ‘Strawberry Letter 23,’ this brew blurs the lines between IPA, Sour Ale, and Fruited Ale. Tart, light strawberry essence and hoppy goodness with overall fruit notes. Brewed with Lactose, London Ale III yeast, Mosaic Lupilin Powder, soured with Lactobacillus Delbrueckii, and fermented on top of ripe Strawberries: This brew is super unique and you won’t want to miss it!
data.food_pairing: Cheesecake, Grilled Chicken, Mixed Greens

data.name: Santa Monica 310 California Blonde Ale
data.description: This light and refreshing blonde ale balances subtle malt sweetness with a touch of hops for a clean, crisp finish.
data.food_pairing: Grilled chicken, Citrus salad, Fish tacos

data.name: Snake River Rotater Series - Hike It Out Hefeweizen
data.description: A true to style Bavarian Style Wheat Beer or Hefeweizen. The banana and clove-like flavors are derived from the specific Bavarian yeast. There is merely a hint of hop flavor added so as not to compete with the yeast notes. Quintessental summer in a glass. Sometimes served with lemon.
data.food_pairing: Grilled chicken, Citrus salad, Lemon bars

data.name: Against the Grain Sho'Nuff
data.description:
This Belgian table bier is a traditional entry into the Session category. It is meant to be consumed with food but also stands well on its own. When you need to drink the whole meal and want something with plenty of flavor but don’t want to get shit-twisted from the alcohol, this is a great choice. Look for
a smooth malty body with hints of biscuit and rye. The hops are subdued and mostlypresent as a bittering agent. The yeast plays a prominent role increating bready and lightly fruity notes.
data.food_pairing: Spicy BBQ ribs, Grilled sausages, Sharp cheddar cheese

data.name: Around The Bend Vera Pistachio Cream Ale
data.description: We all know how wonderful pistachios are. Pistacia vera (genus/species) have been used in culinary applications for thousands of years. For a much shorter period, innovative brewers have employed this tantalizing drupe (that’s right, technically not a nut) to add a luscious character to many styles of beer. Our delicate cream ale really lets the pistachio flavor shine through as the star. The use of Caravienne malt adds a touch more body than some other cream ales along with a pale golden hue. At just over five percent, this is a session beer you’ll want to get crackin’ with.
data.food_pairing: Cheese, Grilled Chicken, Pistachios

data.name: The Black Abbey Crossroads Cream Ale
data.description: An American original adapted from German Koln-style ales. American cluster hops, flaked maize and 6 row barley malt make for a crisp, golden ale.
data.food_pairing: Grilled chicken, Gouda cheese, Pretzels

data.name: Boulevard Plaid Habit
data.description: Born a double-mashed imperial brown ale, then matured for 18 months in freshly drained 10-year Canadian rye whisky barrels, the beer features checkered notes of rich vanilla, charred oak, warming whisky and spicy rye. With a lingering, boozy sweetness and round, resonant flavor, Plaid Habit clearly earns its name.
data.food_pairing: Grilled steak, Smoked Gouda cheese, Dark chocolate.

data.name: Buffalo Bayou Dreamsicle
data.description: A blonde ale deepened with bright orange and sumptuous vanilla. Orange and vanilla complement each other perfectly resulting in a light-bodied refreshing treat to beat the Texas heat.
data.food_pairing: Spicy chicken wings, Grilled shrimp tacos, Citrus salad

data.name: Progression Brewing Momentum NE IPA
data.description: Brewed with an isolated mixed cultured Kveik strain of yeasts from Norway, this clean fermenting yeast has a high temperature tolerance of up to 91 degrees. Allowed to free rise during primary fermentation with the first round of dry hops. Then a second round of dry hop to further exemplify its tropical qualities and characteristics. Silky slick, clean and magical tropical citrus notes shine through and through.
data.food_pairing: Spicy Thai curry, Grilled chicken tacos, Sharp cheddar cheese

data.name: Ravenous Pig Brewing Foxtail Coffee Blonde Ale
data.description: Golden ale with locally roasted Peruvian coffee
data.food_pairing: Burgers, Grilled chicken, Chocolate desserts

data.name: Ravinia Brewing Company Four Shore White Ale
data.description:
Brewed with fresh orange peel, dried orange peel, and Indian
coriander, this refreshing white ale has a creamy richness and a crisp
finish.
data.food_pairing: Seafood, Salad, Chicken

data.name: Valley House Lucky Horseshoe NEIPA
data.description: Fruit forward with big notes of orange, pineapple and grapefruit. Made with Kveik and Juicy yeast, hopped with Idaho 7, Azacca, Mosaic and Equinox hops. It’s the juice.
data.food_pairing: Spicy chicken wings, Grilled shrimp tacos, Citrus-glazed pork chops

data.name: Logic Fuzzy Logic Hazy Peach IPA
data.description: Hazy peach
data.food_pairing: Spicy Thai curry, Grilled peaches with prosciutto, Blue cheese and honey.

data.name: Evans Pollen Nation Honey Blonde Ale
data.description: Crisp & Refreshing. This clean sessionable blonde ale is a Southern California favorite. It pours straw like in color and its subtle aroma and flavor of orange blossom honey make this a balanced, enjoyable beer all year round.
data.food_pairing: Spicy chicken wings, Grilled shrimp, Honey-glazed ham

data.name: Lift Bridge Berry Blonde
data.description: Berry Blonde has aroma and flavor subtly sparked with ripe boysenberry and blackberry juice that integrates beautifully with the light golden malt. Coming in at 4% ABV, Berry Blonde is a pleasant taste of the northland without being too heavy.
data.food_pairing: Salad, Grilled Chicken, Cheesecake

data.name: Mobtown Power Juice Pro Imperial IPA
data.description: We took our super juicy base for Power Juice Pro (hazy DIPA with Citra, Mosaic, & Galaxy), and refermented it on tons of peach and pineapple puree.
data.food_pairing: Spicy Thai curry, Grilled steak, Sharp cheddar cheese

data.name: Progression Standing Ovation NEIPA
data.description: Celebrating the unique character of Galaxy hops from Australia, this beautiful hazy orange hued Double IPA will wow you with its powerful olfactory punch of passion fruit, clean citrus and overripe peach. With a slick and silky mouthfeel and its blend of Amarillo and Galaxy dry hop infusions, we guarantee you'll be back for more.
data.food_pairing: Spicy Thai curry, Grilled chicken tacos, Citrus glazed salmon

data.name: Scorched Earth Hickster
data.description:
Hipsters - the connoisseurs of counterculture and anti-industrialism. A tribe that values time honing their craft and sharing their passion with others, not just toiling away at work to make a buck. They're recognized by their vintage tees, beards, trucker hats, indie-alternative-folk music, beanies, and skinny jeans - driving beer choices and rescuing beer styles on life support. One such style, the American Cream Ale, is making a resurgence. Ours is pale-straw, well-carbonated and balanced, with a biscuity malt sweetness and whisper of citrus notes. We mash-in cracked corn with malted barley, and ferment it in our open fermenter to give the beer its crisp, signature flavor - just begging for another drink. 

Because this beer is brewed in an area still dotted with farms and ranches, we felt it was more appropriate to name this beer after Hipster's country cousin - Hickster. Skinny, tight fitting - no, never. Loose, relaxed, husky. Yeah - that's it.
data.food_pairing: BBQ Ribs, Spicy Chicken Wings, Smoked Gouda Cheese

data.name: Angel City L.A. Blonde
data.description: Brewed to honor the passion and diversity of the City of Angels, L.A. Blonde is a bright, golden-hued, easy-drinking ale that’s as unpretentious as it is sessionable. We take pride in our city, just as much as we take pride in our beer. We are L.A.
data.food_pairing: Grilled chicken, Salad, Fish tacos

data.name: BJ's Brewhouse Blonde
data.description: A light and refreshing pale beer in the style of a German Kolsch. Slightly malty with delicate hopping to balance. Well-conditioned for exceptional smoothness and drinkability!
data.food_pairing: Chicken, Salad, Seafood

data.name: The Black Abbey The Rose Blonde Ale
data.description: Our best seller! A rich, golden color with the spicy aroma of clove and candy banana. The Belgian yeast shines bright on the palate, light and silky, with a clean, slightly drying bitter finish. Pairs well with afternoons on the lake; spring fare, white fish and fruit.
data.food_pairing: Spicy Thai food, Grilled chicken, Goat cheese

data.name: Brew Hub Keybilly Pineapple Coconut
data.description: Island Ale brewed with pineapple and coconut.
data.food_pairing: Spicy Thai curry, Grilled shrimp, Pineapple upside-down cake
